sections.name: Splintershank
sections.text: This creature did not include a description.

traits.name: Unique
traits.text: A rules element with this trait is one-of-a-kind. The DC of Recall Knowledge checks related to creatures with this trait is increased by 10.

traits.name: Tiny
traits.text: *Space:* Less than 5 feet, *Reach (Tall):* 0 feet, *Reach (Long):* 0 feet.  Multiple Tiny creatures can occupy the same square.  At least four can fit in a single square, though the GM might determine that even more can fit.  Tiny creatures can occupy a space larger creature as well, and if their reach is 0 feet, they must do so in order to attack.

traits.name: Fey
traits.text: Creatures of the First World are called the fey

traits.name: Plant
traits.text: Vegetable creatures have the plant trait. They are distinct from normal plants. Magical effects with this trait manipulate or conjure plants or plant matter in some way. Effects that manipulate plants have no effect in an area with no plants.

traits.name: Agile
traits.text: The multiple attack penalty you take with this weapon on the second attack on your turn is –4 instead of –5, and –8 instead of –10 on the third and subsequent attacks in the turn.

traits.name: Finesse
traits.text: You can use your Dexterity modifier instead of your Strength modifier on attack rolls using this melee weapon. You still calculate damage using Strength.

traits.name: Deadly
traits.text: On a critical hit, the weapon adds a weapon damage die of the listed size. Roll this after doubling the weapon’s damage. This increases to two dice if the weapon has a _greater striking rune_ and three dice if the weapon has a _major striking rune_. For instance, a rapier with a _greater striking rune_ deals 2d8 extra piercing damage on a critical hit. An ability that changes the size of the weapon’s normal damage dice doesn’t change the size of its deadly die.

traits.name: Range
traits.text: These attacks will either list a finite range or a range increment, which follows the normal rules for range increments.

ability.name: Bramble Jump

traits.name: Plant
traits.text: Vegetable creatures have the plant trait. They are distinct from normal plants. Magical effects with this trait manipulate or conjure plants or plant matter in some way. Effects that manipulate plants have no effect in an area with no plants.

traits.name: Primal
traits.text:
This magic comes from the primal tradition, connecting to the natural world and instinct. Anything with this trait is magical.  
  
A creature with this trait is primarily constituted of or has a strong connection to primal magic.

traits.name: Teleportation
traits.text: Teleportation effects instantaneously move something from one point in space to another. Teleportation does not usually trigger reactions based on movement.

ability.requirement: Splintershank is in the forest's undergrowth
ability.effect: Splintershank scrambles into the undergrowth and instantly teleports to a different square of undergrowth within 60 feet of him. This movement doesn't trigger reactions.

ability.name: Splinter Spray
ability.text: Splintershank sprays a barrage of splinters and brambles from his body in a 15-foot cone, dealing 7d6 piercing damage (DC 24 basic Reflex save). He can't use Splinter Spray again for 1d4 rounds.
